item.title: Generating signed distance fields for rendering vector graphics
item.description: Generating Signed Distance Fields for rendering vector graphics Note: for this post I will mainly be talking about rendering text, but the technique can be used for any form vector graphics. 1. What & Why The problem: The simplest way to render text is to draw all the characters onto a texture and simply sample from that texture. Lets say we want our texture to be 2048 x 2048 pixels, so each character can be about 180 x 180.
